payload.name: evidence-carrying-actions
payload.title: Evidence-carrying actions: every merge/deploy requires machine-checkable receipts
payload.formal:
action validity predicate:
[
Valid(Output,Receipt,Evidence)=VerifyReceipt \wedge EvidenceSatisfies(contract) \wedge DigestBindingsHold
]

payload.apm2_mapping: AAT bundles, merge receipts, CI attestations—these are not “docs,” they are the core security boundary. Anything not bound to evidence is not real.
